defilement.title: Defilement
defilement.description: Chaining drawings and votes automatically or manually

drawing_time.title: Drawing time
drawing_time.description: The duration to complete the drawing assigned to each team

melvin_role: Founder, designer and developer of the game

tutorial_1.title: Your mission if you accept it
tutorial_1.description: Each team will be given a drawing to work on together (a futuristic car, a legendary animal, etc.).

tutorial_2.title: Achieve your goals
tutorial_2.description: You will have a secret goal to achieve (integrate a wacky detail, add wheels, etc.).

tutorial_3.title: Beware of sabotage!
tutorial_3.description: A saboteur has infiltrated your team to prevent you from completing your mission. Unmask him!

tutorial_4.title: Evaluate your works
tutorial_4.description: Rate the drawings of the other teams on the respect of the mission, creativity, hidden objectives and the level of sabotage.

tutorial_5.title: Find the impostor!
tutorial_5.description: Vote for the player who sabotaged the mission to earn bonus points, be careful not to make a mistake!

voting_time.title: Voting time
voting_time.description: The duration of the debate to find the saboteur.
